contents:
给组件指定format扩展点，可以自定义选择结果显示，组件会将当前选择的数据项以数组的格式作为参数传入

Vue下通过slot="format" slot-scope="values"指定

highlighted.content:
import Cascader from 'kpc/components/cascader';

<Cascader data={{ self.get('data') }} clearable>
    <b:format params="values">
        <div v-if={{ values.length }}>
            <i class="ion-ios-location" style="line-height: 1; margin-right: 8px; vertical-align: middle;"></i>
            {{ values[values.length - 1].label }}
        </div>
    </b:format>
</Cascader>

import Intact from 'intact';
import template from './index.vdt';

export default class extends Intact {
    @Intact.template()
    static template = template;

    defaults() {
        return {
            data: [
                {
                    value: 'beijing',
                    label: '北京',
                    children: [
                        {
                            value: 'haidian',
                            label: '海淀区'
                        },
                        {
                            value: 'chaoyang',
                            label: '朝阳区'
                        },
                        {
                            value: 'fengtai',
                            label: '丰台区'
                        }
                    ]
                },
                {
                    value: 'hunan',
                    label: '湖南',
                    children: [
                        {
                            value: 'changsha',
                            label: '长沙市',
                            children: [
                                {
                                    value: 'yuelu',
                                    label: '岳麓区',
                                }
                            ]
                        },
                        {
                            value: 'yueyang',
                            label: '岳阳市',
                            children: [
                                {
                                    value: 'yueyanglou',
                                    label: '岳阳楼区',
                                },
                                {
                                    value: 'yueyangxian',
                                    label: '岳阳县',
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        };
    }
}

<template>
    <Cascader :data="data" clearable>
        <template slot="format" slot-scope="values">
            <div v-if="values.length">
                <i class="ion-ios-location" style="line-height: 1; margin-right: 8px; vertical-align: middle;"></i>
                {{ values[values.length - 1].label }}
            </div>
        </template>
    </Cascader>
</template>
<script>
import Cascader from 'kpc/components/cascader';

export default {
    components: {
        Cascader
    },
    data() {
        return {
            "data": [
                {
                    "value": "beijing",
                    "label": "北京",
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "value": "haidian",
                            "label": "海淀区"
                        },
                        {
                            "value": "chaoyang",
                            "label": "朝阳区"
                        },
                        {
                            "value": "fengtai",
                            "label": "丰台区"
                        }
                    ]
                },
                {
                    "value": "hunan",
                    "label": "湖南",
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "value": "changsha",
                            "label": "长沙市",
                            "children": [
                                {
                                    "value": "yuelu",
                                    "label": "岳麓区"
                                }
                            ]
                        },
                        {
                            "value": "yueyang",
                            "label": "岳阳市",
                            "children": [
                                {
                                    "value": "yueyanglou",
                                    "label": "岳阳楼区"
                                },
                                {
                                    "value": "yueyangxian",
                                    "label": "岳阳县"
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        }
    },
}
</script>

import React from 'react';
import Cascader from 'kpc/components/cascader';

export default class Demo extends React.Component {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        this.state = {
            "data": [
                {
                    "value": "beijing",
                    "label": "北京",
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "value": "haidian",
                            "label": "海淀区"
                        },
                        {
                            "value": "chaoyang",
                            "label": "朝阳区"
                        },
                        {
                            "value": "fengtai",
                            "label": "丰台区"
                        }
                    ]
                },
                {
                    "value": "hunan",
                    "label": "湖南",
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "value": "changsha",
                            "label": "长沙市",
                            "children": [
                                {
                                    "value": "yuelu",
                                    "label": "岳麓区"
                                }
                            ]
                        },
                        {
                            "value": "yueyang",
                            "label": "岳阳市",
                            "children": [
                                {
                                    "value": "yueyanglou",
                                    "label": "岳阳楼区"
                                },
                                {
                                    "value": "yueyangxian",
                                    "label": "岳阳县"
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        };
    }

    render() {
        return (
            <Cascader data={this.state.data} clearable
                b-format={(values) => {
                    return <React.Fragment>
                        {values.length ?
                            <div>
                                <i className="ion-ios-location" style={{"lineHeight":"1","marginRight":"8px","verticalAlign":"middle"}}></i>
                                {values[values.length - 1].label}
                            </div> :
                            undefined
                        }
                    </React.Fragment>
                }}
            >
            </Cascader>
        )
    }
}
